name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Giig - Source candidates and contacts from LinkedIn

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pull Candidates, Contacts, Companies & Jobs From LinkedIn, Into Giig With A Single Button Click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly streamline your workflow with the Giig Chrome Extension! This powerful extension allows you to extract valuable data from LinkedIn profiles, job listings, and company pages in a single click, and instantly add it to your Giig account.

Whether you're recruiting top talent, researching companies, or managing job applications, this extension is designed to save you time and improve efficiency. Simply navigate LinkedIn, when you navigate to a profile, job or company page the chrome extension will automatically pop up and instantly gather relevant information like profile details, job descriptions, and company insights. The data is automatically synced to your Giig account, eliminating manual data entry and helping you stay organised.

Key Features:

- Extract key details from LinkedIn profiles, including name, experience, and contact information.

- Pull comprehensive data from LinkedIn job listings, such as job descriptions, salary ranges, and job requirements.

- Seamlessly integrate LinkedIn data into your Giig account, making it easier to track candidates, jobs, and companies.

- Fast, accurate, and easy to use â€“ perfect for recruiters.

The Giig LinkedIn Data Extractor requires a Giig Plus account and requires you to be logged in to the chrome extension to sync your data.
